ingredientLines: 2 cups (500 mL) lightly packed baby kale (Note - I wasn't able to find baby kale, so I used regular and gave it a rough chop before measuring and adding to the blender.)
1 cup (250 mL) raspberries, sliced strawberries or your favourite fruit
1/4 cup (60 mL) in total pumpkin or sunflower seeds, hemp hearts, goji berries, cacao nibs or a combination
name: Green Goodness Smoothie Bowl
